ValidationRule.description: Cancellation request date should be booking date and today date
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(if( isNUll(Cancellation_Request_Date__c ),false,Cancellation_Request_Date__c < DATEVALUE(Booking_Date__c)), $Label.Disable_all_validations_from_booking == "false" /*Added by Prashant to control disabling all validations together*/)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Cancellation request date should be greater than booking date
